00046 #if 0

00052     {

00075   template< typename align_T > bool
00076   align(ModelSitemap *query_site, Sitemap& dset_site, 
00077         std::vector<align_T> *alignments)
00078   {
00079     if(query_site->fail() || dset_site.fail() || !alignments) return false;
00080     A_model = query_site;
00081   
00082     errorType error = NONE;
00083     A_targ_pts_beg = dset_site.interact_pts_beg();
00084     std::vector<uint> tmp_array(dset_site.interact_pts_end() - A_targ_pts_beg);
00085     for(uint i = 0; i < tmp_array.size(); ++i) tmp_array[i] = i;
00086     for(uint i = 2; !error && i < tmp_array.size(); i++){
00087       tmp_array[2] = tmp_array[i];
00088       compute_triangles(&tmp_array, 2, 3, alignments);
00089     }
00090 
00091     return true;
00092   }
00093   
00094 
00095 private:
00096   ModelSitemap* A_model;
00097   my_float_t target_centroid[3];
00098   interact_pts_vci A_targ_pts_beg;
00099   my_float_t dmetol_2;  
00100   my_float_t lsetol_2;  
00101   //std::vector<rigid_align_t> *A_alignments; //!< candidate alignments
00102   bool A_allow_hphob_triangles; 
00103 
00104   // Constants for ease of use/readability
00105   static const std::string _fname;           
00106   static const int permutations[6][3];       
00107   static const int point_permutations[6][3]; 
00108   static const int ACCEPTOR_ACCEPTOR;   
00109   static const int DONOR_DONOR;         
00110   static const int HYDROPHOB_HYDROPHOB; 
00111   static const int ACCEPTOR_DONOR;      
00112   static const int ACCEPTOR_DONEPTOR;   
00113   static const int DONOR_DONEPTOR;      
00114   static const int DONEPTOR_DONEPTOR;

00116 
00117   template< typename align_T > void
00118   compute_triangles(std::vector<uint>* arr_p, int index, int length,
00119                     std::vector<align_T> *alignments)
00120   {
00121     std::vector<uint>& arr = *arr_p;
00122     triangle_t target_tri;
00123 
00124     // Get edge lengths and perimeter for the given vertices
00125     for(uint i = 0; i < 3; ++i) 
00126       target_tri.vertices[i] = A_targ_pts_beg + arr[i];
00127     my_float_t perimeter = 0;
00128     for(uint i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00129       target_tri.edge_len[i] = 
00130         dist(target_tri.vertices[i]->pos, target_tri.vertices[(i+1) % 3]->pos);
00131       perimeter += target_tri.edge_len[i];
00132     }
00133     
00134     // Find min and max edge lengths -- assumes no eqilateral triangle
00135     my_float_t min_len = target_tri.edge_len[0];
00136     my_float_t max_len = target_tri.edge_len[0];
00137     for(uint i = 1; i < 3; ++i){
00138       if(target_tri.edge_len[i] > max_len) max_len = target_tri.edge_len[i]; 
00139       else if(target_tri.edge_len[i] < min_len) 
00140         min_len = target_tri.edge_len[i];
00141     }
00142   
00143     // Get the interaction types of the vertices
00144     bool have_Hbond = false;
00145     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00146       if(target_tri.vertices[i]->act_type == ACCEPTOR 
00147          || target_tri.vertices[i]->act_type == DONOR) 
00148         have_Hbond = true;
00149     
00150     // Get iterators to the bucket holding the similar model triangles
00151     int c = 0;
00152     for(uint i = 0; i < 3; ++i) c += target_tri.vertices[i]->act_type;
00153     c = hash_class[c];
00154     if(c >= 10) std::cerr << "need to handle doneptors\n";
00155     bucket_vci bucket_begin, bucket_end;
00156     bool have_model_triangles = 
00157       A_model->get_bucket_iters(c, perimeter, max_len, min_len, 
00158                                 &bucket_begin, &bucket_end);
00159   
00160     // Need a minimum value -- cannot have points that are
00161     // almost colinear or duplicate points
00162     if(min_len > 0.1 && (perimeter - 2*max_len) > 0.1 && 
00163        (have_Hbond || A_allow_hphob_triangles) && have_model_triangles){
00164       for(bucket_vci model_tri = bucket_begin; model_tri < bucket_end;
00165           ++model_tri){
00166         int idx = get_best_correspondence(**model_tri, target_tri);
00167         if(idx == -1) continue;
00168   
00169         // Get the permuted search triangle corresponding to idx and find a 
00170         // rigid rotation and translation (by a least squares fit) to move the 
00171         // permuted search triangle into alignment with the current model 
00172         // triangle.
00173         triangle_t c_tri;
00174         for(uint i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00175           c_tri.vertices[i] = target_tri.vertices[point_permutations[idx][i]];
00176         align_T my_align;
00177         my_align.frag_file = NULL;
00178         if(ThreePtLeastSquares(c_tri, **model_tri, &(my_align.Q), my_align.R,
00179                                my_align.T)){
00180           // Potentially inefficient depending on vector design
00181           my_align.set_triangle_params(perimeter, max_len, min_len);
00182           alignments->push_back(my_align);
00183   
00184           //Kludge for testing sampling since some sites have an exorbant
00185           // number of alignments
00186           if(alignments->size() > 4000000){
00187             std::cout << "number of alignments: " << alignments->size()
00188                       << std::endl;
00189            return;
00190           }
00191         }
00192       }
00193     }
00194 
00195     if(index > 0){
00196       int orig = arr[index-1]; /* store original entry at position index-1 */
00197       while(arr[index-1] < arr[index] - 1) {
00198         /* increase value at position index - 1 as long as it is
00199            still smaller than the value at position index */
00200         arr[index-1]++;
00201         /* recursively increase all elements in the array at
00202            positions [0..index-2] */
00203         compute_triangles(arr_p, index - 1, length, alignments);
00204       }
00205       /* restore original value at position index-1 */
00206       arr[index-1] = orig;
00207     }
00208   }
00209

00223   int get_best_correspondence(const triangle_t& model_tri, 
00224                               const triangle_t& search_tri);
00225 
00227 
00235   bool 
00236   ThreePtLeastSquares(const triangle_t& A, const triangle_t& B, Quaternion *Q,
00237                       my_float_t *R, my_float_t *T);
00238 
00239 
00240   bool
00241   get_triangles(triangle_t *target_tri, const std::vector<uint>& arr, 
00242                 bucket_vci *bucket_begin, bucket_vci *bucket_end);
00243 
00244 };
00245 } // end namespace SimSite3D
